answerText: register[10] These low-level programming languages require the programmer to manually perform register allocation. Each statement in these languages corresponds to a single instruction.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 3 | 9 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question: During program compilation, it is necessary to ensure that the allocation of variables to these units is done in an efficient manner. For 10 points each: [10] Name these small, quickly-accessible units of memory found within a processor. They are often classified by how many bits of information they can hold.
